about.title: About
about.body: Mechanical engineer and industrial designer focused on product design, technical drawings, and manufacturable solutions. I collaborate with architects and stakeholders to translate requirements into precise CAD models, production documentation, and assembly plans. My experience spans mining equipment, architectural installations, and industrial projects, with strong hands-on delivery from concept to fabrication.
